mapper.insert: INSERT INTO olms.sys_attendance (user_id, appointment_id, status, absence_reason, create_time, update_time) select * from ( select sys_user.id uid, sys_appointment.id, '0', null, now() create_time, now() update_time from sys_appointment inner join sys_user_student on sys_appointment.class_number = sys_user_student.class_number and sys_appointment.major_id = sys_user_student.major_id and sys_appointment.grade = sys_user_student.grade inner join sys_time_slot on sys_appointment.time_slot_id = sys_time_slot.id inner join sys_user on sys_user_student.sid = sys_user.username where sys_appointment.`type` = '1' and current_date()= sys_appointment.book_time and current_time() between start_time and end_time union all select sys_user.id uid, sys_appointment.id, '0', null, now() create_time, now() update_time from sys_appointment inner join sys_time_slot on sys_appointment.time_slot_id = sys_time_slot.id inner join sys_user on sys_appointment.user_id = sys_user.id where sys_appointment.`type` = '0' and current_date()= sys_appointment.book_time and current_time() between start_time and end_time ) as T where not exists( select * from sys_attendance where sys_attendance.appointment_id = T.id and sys_attendance.user_id = T.uid)
mapper.select: select sys_attendance.id,name lab_name,sys_attendance.status,absence_reason,experiment_name,book_time,start_time,end_time from sys_attendance left join sys_appointment on sys_attendance.appointment_id = sys_appointment.id left join sys_time_slot on sys_time_slot.id=sys_appointment.time_slot_id left join sys_lab on sys_lab.id=sys_appointment.lab_id where sys_attendance.user_id=#{userId}

select sys_appointment.id,name lab_name,sys_appointment.class_number,experiment_name,book_time,start_time,end_time from sys_appointment left join sys_time_slot on sys_time_slot.id=sys_appointment.time_slot_id left join sys_lab on sys_lab.id=sys_appointment.lab_id where (sys_appointment.user_id=#{userId} or sys_lab.master_id=#{userId}) and sys_appointment.type=1 and sys_appointment.status='1' order by book_time desc
select status,real_name,username,sys_attendance.update_time from sys_attendance left join sys_user on sys_user.id=sys_attendance.user_id where appointment_id=#{appointmentId}
